name: bug-buzz
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
